topic.title: 부동산 임대 상담 및 계약
topic.description: 부동산 임대 과정에서 필요한 상담, 조건 확인, 계약 관련 실용적 영어 표현을 학습합니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 안녕하세요, 원룸 임대에 대해 문의드리려고 연락했습니다.
온라인에서 본 매물이 아직 임대 가능한지 확인하고 싶어요.
월세가 얼마인지와 보증금은 얼마나 되는지 알고 싶습니다.
가장 가까운 지하철역까지 걸어서 몇 분 정도 걸리나요?
계약 조건에 대해서도 자세히 설명해 주실 수 있나요?
필요한 서류는 어떤 것들이 있는지 미리 준비하고 싶어요.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, I'm calling to inquire about a studio apartment rental.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | I'm calling to inquire about | a studio apartment rental.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I'd like to confirm if the property I saw online is still available for rent.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I'd like to confirm | if the property I saw online | is still available for rent.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I want to know how much the monthly rent is and what the security deposit amount is.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I want to know | how much the monthly rent is | and what the security deposit amount is.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: And is the maintenance fee separate?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: And is | the maintenance fee separate?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I'm curious about the public transportation access.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I'm curious about | the public transportation access.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: How many minutes does it take to walk to the nearest subway station?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: How many minutes | does it take to walk | to the nearest subway station?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Is it possible to have an interior viewing?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Is it possible | to have an interior viewing?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Could you explain the lease terms in detail as well?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Could you explain | the lease terms | in detail as well?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: What's the minimum contract period in years?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: What's the minimum | contract period | in years?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I'd also like to know if early termination is possible.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I'd also like to know | if early termination | is possible.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: When is the earliest move-in date?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: When is | the earliest move-in date?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I'd like to prepare the required documents in advance, so what documents are needed?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I'd like to prepare | the required documents in advance, | so what documents are needed?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Do you give enough time for contract review?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Do you give | enough time | for contract review?

keyword_speeches.target_sentence: Hello, I'm calling to inquire about a studio apartment rental.
I'd like to confirm if the property I saw online is still available for rent.
I want to know how much the monthly rent is and what the security deposit amount is.
And is the maintenance fee separate?
I'm curious about the public transportation access.
How many minutes does it take to walk to the nearest subway station?
Is it possible to have an interior viewing?
Could you explain the lease terms in detail as well?
What's the minimum contract period in years?
I'd also like to know if early termination is possible.
When is the earliest move-in date?
I'd like to prepare the required documents in advance, so what documents are needed?
Do you give enough time for contract review?

highlight_sentences.korean_text: 필요한 서류는 어떤 것들이 있는지 미리 준비하고 싶어요.
highlight_sentences.foreign_text: I'd like to prepare the required documents in advance, so what documents are needed?
highlight_sentences.reason: 목적을 나타내는 'so' 접속사와 간접의문문 구조를 포함하여 부동산 계약 시 서류 준비에 대한 적극적인 문의 방법을 학습할 수 있습니다.
